User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the ImageDrop application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

googleId.description: The unique identifier provided by Google for the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

profileImageUrl.description: URL of the user's profile image.

Image.title: Image
Image.description: Represents an image uploaded by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the image entity.

url.description: URL of the uploaded image in Firebase Storage.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the image was uploaded.

userName.description: The display name of the user who uploaded the image.

userPhotoURL.description: The profile picture URL of the user who uploaded the image.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. The userId is the Firebase Authentication UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Authentication UID of the user.

definition.description: Stores images uploaded by a specific user. Path-based ownership ensures only the user can access their images.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Authentication UID of the user who owns the image.

params.name: imageId
params.description: The unique ID of the image.

definition.description: A root-level collection for all images to allow public browsing. This collection can be queried by any authenticated user to populate the main gallery.

params.name: imageId
params.description: The unique ID of the image.
